last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: Olya and Uljana say goodbye to Swieta and leave for Ukraine. Polina is sad to be alone in Warsaw. Nowakowa notices Henryk is unhappy in her apartment.

name: Dziewczyny ze Lwowa
overview: Four Ukrainian women from different walks of life move to Poland with empty wallets and pockets full of dreams to start new chapters in their lives.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Four Ukrainian women from different walks of life move to Poland with empty wallets and pockets full of dreams to start a new chapter in their lives.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After adapting to the reality of living in Poland, Swieta, Polina, Uljana and Olya continue to stumble into misadventures in their private lives.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The women’s lives don’t slow down. Swieta and Polina face unusual business problems, Uliana struggles with her image and Olya has a mysterious stalker.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The hard-working women find themselves in the middle of a criminal case — the biggest challenge they’ll have to face since moving to Poland.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A group of girls from Ukraine arrive in a new and totally different place. Warsaw is vast with bustling streets, and their tenement house is sketchy.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The girls start looking for work. Uljana and Olya go to the "bazaar" in Piaseczno. Polina searches online. Swieta gets ready to work at a law firm.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When Olya is hit by a car in a side street, two police officers drive her home. However, their visit to the girls' place lasts longer than expected.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Polina agrees to her boss's proposal that she manage her colleagues' work. Uljana gets a violin from the professor. Olya starts working for Nowakowa.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Olya is upset because she thinks Nowakowa fired her. Swieta is petrified at the prospect of a banquet where she is due to meet her attorney, Piotr.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Swieta visits Piotr. They both struggle to pretend that nothing happened. Piotr decides to take the next step, but he goes one step too far...

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The professor decides to teach Uljana to play the violin. Consequently, someone new is needed to run the house. Igor comes to Warsaw.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Igor discovers that his Olya is going out with Tomek, so he decides to get revenge. Desperate to remedy the situation, the girls ask Henryk for help.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Swieta tells Piotr they can't be together. Disappointed and unable to come to terms with this decision, he decides to fight for her.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Henryk asks Olya to clean his friend's place in Ząbki. However, neither Tomek nor Olya know whose home they're about to enter.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Swieta, accompanied by Piotr, goes to Ukraine to visit her daughter, who is unwell. Polina starts another business. Nowakowa suddenly passes out.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Nowakowa leaves the hospital. She's accompanied by Olya, who tries to take care of her like her own grandmother and prove she can do more than clean.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Uljana continues her lessons with the professor, who's becoming increasingly worried. His beloved daughter-in-law knows the reason for his mood.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Four Ukrainian women from different walks of life move to Poland with empty wallets and pockets full of dreams to start a new chapter in their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Polina, Uljana, Swieta and Olya allegedly still live at Henryk's place. In reality, Swieta often stays with Piotr, and Olya stays upstairs at Tomek's.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Piotr tells Swieta his lawyer friend keeps asking about her. Uljana contacts her mother in Lviv. Olya is still working for the gangster near Warsaw.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The conflict in the house is resolved and Halina becomes the perfect daughter-in-law. Polina, Jacek and Swieta make more money on their trips to Lviv.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The three-person company exporting children's clothes to the East has problems with extortionists. The negotiation ends badly, especially for Jacek.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Uljana ends up in the ER. However, the girls still don't know that the reason for her fainting was Denis, who paid Nastka's mother a visit in Warsaw.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The professor hosts a meeting about the violin, attended by Uljana and Henryk. Polina goes to the consulate in Lviv to apply for a "Polish Card."

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The professor decides to pay the ransom for the violin. Olya has a new problem — Tomek's mother wants to befriend her. Swieta begins a new chapter.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Denis has to reveal where he hid the professor's violin. The information is extracted with the full cooperation of both criminals and law enforcement.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Swieta is shocked by the sight of Piotr sleeping in Henryk's kitchen. The dilapidated home's owner has a completely different take on the matter.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Olya returns to Cynowa Street and meets Polina, who has no idea what happened. The girls get into a row that also involves Tomek.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Polina catches the captain rummaging through her purse and demands an explanation. Olya is intrigued by undercover agents watching Matylda's house.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Olya obeys the agents' orders but confesses to Matylda about her deal with the police. Polina decides to open a Ukrainian restaurant in Warsaw.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Polina returns to Warsaw with her prized "Polish Card." A surprise awaits her at the station. The Ukrainian nurses wake up after a night at Piotr's.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After adapting to the reality of living in Poland, Swieta, Polina, Uljana and Olya continue to stumble into misadventures in their private lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Polina and Matylda run a restaurant. Uljana leaves the house but keeps playing. Swieta starts a company. Olya takes a language course.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Swieta worries it's her fault that Henryk ended up in an ambulance. Olya feels as if she's being followed. She shares her observations with Tomek.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Olya becomes even more paranoid, convinced someone is following her. Keen to check if his beloved has gone crazy, Tomek starts following her himself.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The daughter of Halina's cousin, Klaudia, visits the professor, who gets the giggles. Tomek discovers Olya really is being followed.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After visiting her home in Ukraine, Swieta worries about her son, Oleh, who often comes home with bruises. Uljana plays some jazz tunes with the guys.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Nowakowa goes to the hospital to visit Henryk, but there's a surprise in store for her. Swieta is constantly looking for new commissions.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Nowakowa complies with Karolina and Jakub's request to write a will. She invites them to her home and tells them some shocking information.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Olya has nightmares due to Hanka's jewelry. She's also upset because she can't remember her father. Piotr helps Swieta to bring Oleh over from Lviv.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A clash with Kamyk's bodyguards prompts Henryk to reflect on the point of his actions. Meanwhile, Polina has her own problems to worry about.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Piotr brings Swieta's children to Warsaw and becomes a full-time father. The tenement house residents discover that their water is due to be cut off.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Uljana meets with Klaudia to ask for some help with changing her image. But is she sure she's chosen the right person?

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Polina must make an excuse for the events at the restaurant. Can she convince Konstanty she had nothing to do with him and his friends being arrested?

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Tomek receives a call from his mom with some surprising information. Nowakowa learns why her husband didn't like lighting the fire in the living room.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The women’s lives don’t slow down. Swieta and Polina face unusual business problems, Uliana struggles with her image and Olya has a mysterious stalker.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Polina gets an offer from the gangster that she can't refuse. But she soon realizes that Konstanty doesn't care about her welfare, only about profit.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Tomek is increasingly horrified by Olya's idea. His mom unexpectedly comes to the rescue by making a rather startling offer.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sarkisjan and Rysiek appear on Cynowa Street, asking about Katia. Zdunek comes looking for Romek. The only clue is a recording on the boy's cellphone.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Klaudia's arrival at the professor's house causes quite a stir. Olya has a lot hanging over her head. Sarkisjan and Rysiek search for Katia in Lviv.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In pursuit of an escaping commando, the captain finds a crashed car. All attendees of the fateful party at Polina's restaurant are detained.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Polina, Olya, Matylda and Hanka are interrogated. The police try to break them and convince them to cooperate. Swieta recovers in the hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The gangsters discover Matylda and Polina were released from custody. Henryk and the captain set up an ambush for Bryła. A race against time begins.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Swieta is depressed and refuses to go to the hospital. Henryk makes her an offer. Polina starts showing up at Arek's apartment — but why?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The captain has an unexpected Ukrainian guest. With Henryk's help, Polina tracks down a member of the Myszor gang and gets some valuable information.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Olya awaits trial. Wiktor shows up at Henryk's to find out about Polina, who is trying to sell her stake in the restaurant. Oleh still keeps fighting.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: With Olya's trial imminent, Nowakowa visits her in custody. Katia shows up on Cynowa Street — she's getting married and wants to deal with her past.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Olya is released from custody and cherishes every moment of her freedom. Henryk makes the brave decision to move in with Nowakowa.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Olya and Uljana say goodbye to Swieta and leave for Ukraine. Polina is sad to be alone in Warsaw. Nowakowa notices Henryk is unhappy in her apartment.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The hard-working women find themselves in the middle of a criminal case — the biggest challenge they’ll have to face since moving to Poland.
